verbose_text: In conclusion, the inhibition of CD44 by shRNA-CD44 following stimulation with TGF-beta1 abolished the expression of CD44 and EGFR, deactivated the EGF / EGFR signaling pathways and inhibited the process of EMT, suggesting that there is a link between TGF-beta1 and CD44 / EGFR in the process of EMT.
